title: 怎么获得指定玩家IP？
author: mc1zi1
txt_content: spigotAPI中的哪一条函数可以做到取指定玩家IP

replies.author: hemp
replies.txt_content:
Player接口中有getAddress()方法
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadoc ... r.html#getAddress--

replies.author: 丛林水塘
replies.txt_content:
hemp 发表于 2019-7-22 22:48
Player接口中有getAddress()方法
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadoc ... r.html#getAddress--
没有函数能够根据玩家名称查IP吗？

replies.author: hemp
